title: 17-year-old boy shot in Pilsen
content:
A 17-year-old boy was shot Sunday afternoon in the Pilsen neighborhood on the Lower West Side.
At 3:33 p.m., the boy was inside a vehicle in the 1500 block of West 17th Street when someone in a dark-colored vehicle fired shots and drove away, Chicago Police said.
The boy was taken to Stroger Hospital in serious condition, police said.
